gimbal package¶

gimbal.gimbal module¶

class source.gimbal.gimbal.Gimbal(parent=None, state=None)¶

Bases: source.module.Module

process(x, y, frame_dims)¶

Processes screen coords and frame and converts them to a set of angles

Parameters

  • x ([type]) – [description]

  • y ([type]) – [description]

  • frame_dims ([type]) – [description]

Returns

delta x and y angles

Return type

list of two floats

truncate_angle(angle)¶

Truncates angle to be in range of -180 to 180 degrees

Parameters

angle (float) – angle to be truncated in degrees

Returns

180 if angle is greater than 180, -180 if angle is less than -180, otherwise keeps the same angle

Return type

flat
